Packages that use dao
Package
Description
dao
 
service
 
  • Classes in dao used by dao
    Class
    Description
    BaseDAO
    Abstract base class for all DAO classes.
    DbConnection
    DbConnection handles the creation and management of the database connection.
  • Classes in dao used by service
    Class
    Description
    AdminDAO
    AdminDAO handles admin-related database operations including authentication, adding admins, and managing users.
    BookDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) class for handling database operations related to Books.
    CdDAO
    CdDAO handles database operations related to CDs.
    FineDAO
    FineDAO handles all database operations related to fines in the library system.
    LoansDAO
    LoansDAO handles all database operations related to loans in the library system.
    UserDAO
    UserDAO handles all database operations related to library users.
